item.title: Amazon FireTV review
item.description: So I recently bought an Amazon FireTV lite for Rs 2,100 in hopes that I could put my TV to some use. Here’s my experience with it. The Good I didn’t realise this at first, but the FireTV is actually some sort of a skin on Android TV I think and this brings in the same familiarity and customisability. Something I long forgotten existed since my recent shift to the Apple ecosystem.
